text:
Where all you need that is natural and without "extras" to harm our body is sold in this little shop.  Includes various supplements (highly recommended if you're looking for real stuff eg. vitamin eg. D, K , supplements for bone, eyes etc... ),  vegetables, nuts, daily provisions (food and non-food) are available here.
I love their natto miso, and vitamin C from S. America forest which is unlike those commercial ones readily available containing artificial ingredients.  It may cost more but in the end healthier for our body & no hidden costs.
Another hidden gem is their most knowledgeable staff ! Happy shopping...
Very helpful and knowledgeable staffs. Not pushy at all and make sure i m well informed on my choices. Strongly recommended to go over for good organic food.
A place for holistic healing information as well as selling organic stuff

One of the earliest health food and alternative health stores in Singapore. There is a wealth of information through the reading material, organic and biodynamic food and health items and knowledgeable staff. The food and supplements are of top quality and sourced globally from reputed companies. They also regularly curate and host informative talks and workshops for physical, emotional, mental and spiritual health. Do visit!

Awesome place ! This is a rare holistic place where you can reclaimed your health through  its Cosy but comprehensive library, as well as make purchases from its  very healing product Range at their organic shop .
